of the medium sized weebee doll pattern to complete this pattern which you can find here when i make my medium sized weebee dolls using worsted/4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook they stand at around 7 inches tall made all in one from the toes to the top of the head with the arms crocheted on as you go other yarn weights and hook sizes can of course be used to create smaller or larger dolls which yarns did i use for my doll and clothing we don t have much choice here in the uk yarn wise stylecraft special and paintbox acrylic yarns are my absolute favourite brands though lovely to work with and reasonably priced 😊 useful info for those who crochet left handed please take a look at this site for hints and tips about following crochet patterns if you are left handed ~ 1 ~ terminology doll you just need to use a combination of yarn and hook size that gives you nice tight stitches everyone is different what works for one person might not work for another it took me a few attempts to find the perfect combination for my dolls and it may be the same for you the size of your doll will be dependant upon the weight of yarn you choose the brand of the yarn as they can differ vastly as
